GK19raggancu:4: dantāvalo gajastasyevāsyaṃ mukhaṃ yasya sa gajānanastadātmanā tadrūpeṇa pariṇataṃ taṃ bhūmānaṃ paraṃ brahmopāsmahe |
GK19raggancu:9: tadvivartarūpaḥ prapañca eva madhurāmodacchaṭātvena rūpitastena meduram |
GK19raggancu:13_0: vidhūto vividho vyāsaṅgo yairata eva śuddho ya āśayastasminprādurbhūtaḥ sudhārasaḥ
GK19raggancu:13_1: śāntisukhaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca te prasṛmaraṃ prasāri dhyānaṃ yasminnīdṛśaṃ yadāspadaṃ kaṃdarādi
GK19raggancu:14: tāraśrīparaśaktikāmavasudhārūpānugāṃ yaṃ vidustasmai stātpraṇatirgaṇādhipataye yo rāgiṇābhyarthyate /
GK19raggancu:15: āmantrya prathamaṃ vareti varadetyārtena sarvaṃ janaṃ svāminme vaśamānayeti satataṃ svāhādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ // RMgan_2 //
GK19raggancu:21: iti pañcarūpāṇāṃ bījānāmanu gamityakṣarametādṛśaṃ yaṃ sādhakā vidustasmai gaṇādhipataye praṇatiḥ stāditi yojanā |
GK19raggancu:23: ārtena rāgiṇā prathamaṃ vareti tato varadetyāmantryābhyarthyate |
GK19raggancu:27: mantre tu gaṇapataye tathā sarvajanamityekameva padam |
GK19raggancu:30: mūle kalpatarormahāmaṇimaye pīṭhe 'kṣarāmbhoruhe ṣaṭkoṇākalitatrikoṇaracanasatkarṇike 'muṃ bhaje // RMgan_3 //
GK19raggancu:31: kallolānāṃ mahormīṇāmañcalāḥ prāntāstairāśliṣṭā meghatatiryenaitādṛśa ikṣurasasamudre suradrumāṇāṃ pārijātādīnāṃ vanaṃ tadāmodena paripuṣṭe |
GK19raggancu:32_0: ratnamayaṃ dvīpaṃ vārimadhyasthalaṃ tadgatasya kalpatarormūle mahāmaṇimayaṃ pīṭhaṃ
GK19raggancu:34: āśliṣṭaṃ priyayā sarojakarayā ratnasphuradbhūṣayā māṇikyapratimaṃ mahāgaṇapatiṃ viśveśamāśāsmahe // RMgan_4 //
GK19raggancu:45: śuṇḍāgre puṣkare jāgratsthito ghaṭo ratnapūrṇo hemakumbho yasya |
GK19raggancu:46: kamalahastayā priyayā dakṣiṇahastenāliṅgitaṃ māṇikyapratimaṃ śoṇacchaviṃ sarveśvaraṃ mahāgaṇapatimāśāsmahe ||
GK19raggancu:48: trailokyeṣṭāvidhānavarṇasubhagaṃ yaḥ padmarāgopamaṃ dhatte sa śriyamātanotu satataṃ devo gaṇānāṃ patiḥ // RMgan_5 //
GK19raggancu:49: dānāmbhasā madāmbunā parimeduraṃ vyāptaṃ prasṛmarānvyālambino rolambānbhramarānbibhartīti prasṛmaravyālambirolambabhṛt |
GK19raggancu:51: padmarāgopamaṃ padmarāgo lohitakastadupamaṃ praśastidvayaṃ yo dhatte sa gaṇānāṃ patirdevaḥ satataṃ śriyamātanotu |
GK19raggancu:53: tathā dānāmbulipte sindūravati kumbhasthale bhramarā ityuktaṃ bhavati ||
GK19raggancu:55: dikkāntāghanasāracandanarasāsārāḥ śrayantāṃ manaḥ svacchandaprasarapraliptaviyato herambadantatviṣaḥ // RMgan_6 //
GK19raggancu:58: bhrāmyato mandarasya ghūrṇanāvṛttayastadāyattasya kṣīrābdhervīcayo laharyastāsāṃ chaṭā agrabhāgāstaiḥ sadṛśāḥ |
GK19raggancu:70: jyotsnāpūrataraṅge mantharaṃ tarantī cāsau saṃdhyā ca tasyā vayasyāḥ sāmyātsakhyaḥ |
GK19raggancu:74: śuṇḍāpradhṛtasuvarṇakalaśasaṃgṛhītena kṣaratā bahutvādbahirapi nirgacchatā muktāmāṇikyādiratnasamūhena koṭiśaḥ sādhakajanānsaṃbhāvayannasaṃkhyātānupāsakānsaṃpadā vardhayan /
GK19raggancu:79: herambaṃ praṇamāmi yasya purataḥ śāṇḍilyamūle śriyā bibhratyāmburuhe samaṃ madhuripuste śaṅkhacakre vahan /
GK19raggancu:80: nyagrodhasya tale sahādrisutayā śaṃbhustayā dakṣiṇe bibhrāṇaḥ paraśuṃ triśūlamitayā pāśāṅkuśābhyāṃ śubham // RMgan_9 //
GK19raggancu:81: śāṇḍilyamūle bilvavṛkṣasyādho yasya mahāgaṇapateḥ purato 'grabhāge padme bibhratyā śriyā samaṃ te prasiddhe śaṅkhacakre vahanmadhuripurviṣṇurasti |
GK19raggancu:82: tathā yasya dakṣiṇe nyagrodhasya tale vaṭavṛkṣādhaḥ pāśāṅkuśābhyāmitayā sahitayādrisutayā pārvatyā saha paraśuṃ triśūlaṃ ca bibhrāṇaḥ śaṃbhuḥ śivo 'sti ||
GK19raggancu:83: paścātpippalamāśrito ratipatirdevasya ratyotpale bibhratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuriṣūnpauṣpānvahanpañca ca /
GK19raggancu:84: vāme cakragadādharaḥ sa bhagavānkroḍaḥ priyaṃgostale hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayā devyā dharaṇyā saha // RMgan_10 //
GK19raggancu:85: devasya paścime pippalavṛkṣasyādha utpale bibhratyā ratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuḥ pañca pauṣpāniṣūṃśca vahan ratipatiḥ kāmadevo 'sti /
GK19raggancu:86_0: asya ca vāme priyaṃguvṛkṣādho hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayaikasminkare kīramanyatra
GK19raggancu:86_1: kalamakaṇiśaṃ bibhratyā dharaṇyā saha sa prasiddho bhagavānkroḍo varāho 'sti taṃ
GK19raggancu:87: ṣaṭkoṇāśriṣu ṣaṭsu ṣaḍ gajamukhāḥ pāśāṅkuśābhīvarānbibhrāṇāḥ pramadāsakhāḥ pṛthumahāśoṇāśmapuñjatviṣaḥ /
GK19raggancu:88: āmodaḥ purataḥ pramodasumukhau taṃ cābhito durmukhaḥ paścātpārśvagato 'sya vighna iti yo vighnakarteti ca // RMgan_11 //
GK19raggancu:89: ṣaṭkoṇasya pīṭhasya ṣaṭsvaśriṣu pālīṣu ṣaḍ gajamukhā dhyeyāḥ |
GK19raggancu:94: pṛthuścāsau mahāśoṇāśmanāṃ padmarāgāṇāṃ puñjastadvattviṭ kāntiryeṣāṃ te |
GK19raggancu:95: yadi 'pṛthumahāḥ'; iti visargāntaḥ pāṭhastadā bhinnaṃ padam |
GK19raggancu:100: puraḥ kalpitapūrvadigapekṣayāgnikoṇe pramodaḥ, evamīśānakoṇe sumukha ityarthaḥ |
GK19raggancu:102: asya durmukhasya vighna iti yasya nāma sa ekasminpārśve vighnakarteti yasya nāma sa dvitīyapārśve 'sti |
GK19raggancu:104: āmodādigaṇeśvarapriyatamāstatraiva nityaṃ sthitāḥ kāntāśleṣarasajñamantharadṛśaḥ siddhiḥ samṛddhistataḥ /
GK19raggancu:105: kāntiryā madanāvatītyapi tathā kalpeṣu yā gīyate sānyā yāpi madadravā tadaparā drāviṇyamūḥ pūjitāḥ // RMgan_12 //
GK19raggancu:106: kāntasya svasvabharturāliṅganarasaṃ jānantyata eva mantharā rāgiṇī dṛgyāsāṃ tāḥ |
GK19raggancu:107: āmodādīnāṃ pūrvaślokoktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāryāsteṣāṃ samīpe sthitā dhyeyāḥ |
GK19raggancu:108: tāsāṃ nāmāni ca - siddhiḥ, samṛddhiḥ, kāntiḥ, madanāvatī, madadravā, drāviṇī ceti ||
GK19raggancu:109: āśliṣṭau vasudhetyatho vasumatī tābhyāṃ sitālohitau varṣantau vasu pārśvayorvilasatastau śaṅkhapadmau nidhī /
GK19raggancu:110: aṅgānyanvatha mātaraśca paritaḥ śakrādayo 'bjāśrayāstadbāhye kuliśādayaḥ paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ // RMgan_13 //
GK19raggancu:111: vasudhayā vasumatyā ca krameṇāliṅgitau śuklaraktavarṇau dhanaṃ varṣantau tau śaṅkhapadmasaṃjñau prasiddhau nidhī ṣaṭkoṇapārśvayorvilasataḥ /
GK19raggancu:115: ṣaṭkoṇādbahiḥsthite 'ṣṭadalakamala indrādayo dikpālāstadbāhye teṣāṃ samīpa eva paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ pradīptasvarūpā indrādīnāṃ hetayo vajrādyā dhyeyāḥ ||
GK19raggancu:117: ānandaikarasāvabodhalaharīvidhvastasarvormaye sarvatra prathamānamugdhamahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ // RMgan_14 //
GK19raggancu:118: 'herambaṃ praṇamāmi'; (9/10) iti ślokābhyāṃ viṣṇuśivādisvarūpaistanurmūrtiryasya sa tasmai |
GK19raggancu:124: te ca - jāyate, asti, vardhate, vipariṇamate, apakṣīyate, naśyatīti ca |
GK19raggancu:125: ānandaikarasāvayodhalaharībhirvidhvastāḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhakānāmūrmayaḥ ṣaḍindriyajanyā vṛttayo yasmādityeke |
GK19raggancu:127: sarvatra prathamānaṃ mugdhaṃ sundaraṃ maho yasya tasmai parasmai jagato 'nyasmai namaḥ ||
GK19raggancu:129: rājannīrājanaśrīsakhacaraṇanakhadyotavidyotamānaḥ śreyaḥ stheyaḥ sa deyānmama vimaladṛśo bandhuraṃ sindhurāsyaḥ // RMgan_15 //
GK19raggancu:133: te ca te devāsuranarāṇāṃ samūhāsteṣāṃ dedīpyamānamukuṭāgrāṇāṃ yā koṭiḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣastatra vyāṭīkamānāḥ susaṃgatāḥ sūryatulyaratnapaṅktikāntipravāhāsteṣām |
GK19raggancu:134: rājantī nīrājanaśrīrārātrikaśobhā tasyāḥ sakhāyaste ca te caraṇanakhāśca teṣāṃ dyotena prakāśena vidyotamānaḥ sa prasiddhaḥ sindhurāsyo gajamukhaḥ |
GK19raggancu:136: mama bandhuraṃ ramyaṃ stheyaḥ sthirataraṃ śreyaḥ kalyāṇaṃ deyāt |
GK19raggancu:138: 'vimaladṛśā'; iti pāṭhe tu saumyāvalokanena śreyo dadyādityarthaḥ ||
GK19raggancu:140: yaḥ stauti pracurataraṃ mahāgaṇeśaṃ tasyeyaṃ bhavati vaśaṃvadā trilokī // RMgan_16 //
GK19raggancu:145: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryavaryaśrīrāghavacaitanyaviracitaṃ mahāgaṇapatistotraṃ tacchiṣyakṛtayā ṭippaṇyā sametaṃ samāptam ||
